EmailTemplate.description: This email is to be sent to customers who has inquired about GST
EmailTemplate.name: Email on GST Center
EmailTemplate.subject: Explore GST with QuickBooks
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Explore GST with Intuit QuickBooks
Come, explore GST with QuickBooks
Hi {!Opportunity.Primary_Contact__c}! Thank you for subscribing to QuickBooks, the world’s #1 online accounting software for small businesses. With the Goods and Services Tax (GST) expected to be implemented from July 1, I would recommend you to visit the QuickBooks GST Center, where you’ll find relevant information and updates about GST. If you ever get stuck with QuickBooks anytime during your subscription, feel free to reach us.
We're happy to help
Online support Call us Live community Visit now 1800 102 5599* Ask a question
Have an awesome day! {!Opportunity.OwnerFullName} Quickbooks Consultant {!Opportunity.OwnerEmail} {!User.MobilePhone}
*Mon to Sat 9:30 am - 6:00 pm Intuit respects your privacy. To learn more, read our Privacy Statement. If you receive a suspicious email, please report it. Visit Security to find more. © Intuit India Software Solutions Pvt. Ltd.
